scripts.run:all:dev: yarn deploy:dev && yarn build:frontend && yarn publish:frontend:dev
scripts.run:all:test: yarn deploy:test && yarn build:frontend && yarn publish:frontend:test
scripts.remove:all:dev: lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'frontend' -- --stage dev && lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'monitoring-*' -- --stage dev
scripts.remove:all:test: lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'frontend' -- --stage test && lerna run --concurrency 1 remove --scope 'monitoring-*' -- --stage test
scripts.print:name: lerna run print:name
